entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:20 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Rain, -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 06:20 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Freezing Rain
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: NE 28 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to freezing rain or rain this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Risk of freezing rain over higher terrain this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 20 overnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Fog patches. Temperature steady near 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023
